author: Rebecca
text: No one really likes me it's only for a couple of weeks until one gets sick of me.I hate my friends .I guess I'm fake .People pack their bags and leave saying they need space but ik.I m tired of me too.Just need one who stays through my worst days .

text:
I'm paralysed.
I'm lost and it kills me .

author: Rebecca
text: It's dangerous how much hate I have for every single person who hurted me.I pray you all get paid back in a wonderful way.Amen.

author: Rebecca
text: I hate Women too.

author: Rebecca
text: I hate all Men but

author: Rebecca
text: I can't bear with this everyday.Maybe I'm to small to understand all the stuff.i just don't know .I dont want tomorrow ik she will beat me or do something to instigate us and then prove to my father that I m getting out of hands.

author: Rebecca
text:
That she would burn me alive.
Idk maybe it's common in Indian households.But these days she has started making fuss out of nothing.also she is relation with some guy (only ik) and has an ex already .Idk how to keep all this in my head.I wish I was dead .I just want to end it all.

author: Rebecca
text: And i went to my father to tell her to stop with all this.She said I was trying to spoil the husband wife relation.I am very clever and what not .idk maybe I was wrong but I couldn't bear with all that she said.

author: Rebecca
text:
And my sister.
We both started crying.and then she started abusing us for crying .idk what she expected.  like all the things she kept on saying that she wish they were her daughters and what not.she started getting physical with my sister.I couldn't stand that (I'm younger tho)

author: Rebecca
text:
I plainly said I won't be able to talk to them  .(I'm very insecure as a person and felt stupid dumb and what not.
They looked like divas ;)).We came home and she created a whole new drama .idk .ik I'm not being respectful but idk as soon as we arrived she started bodyshamin me

author: Rebecca
text:
So yes here's my heartbreaking story.
Today We went to a family function.
There were  girls of my age much prettier , talented. MY mother said she was embarrassed to have me as her kid .She asked me to talk to that circle and try to be with them. My introvert ass couldn't do it.

author: Rebecca
text: I miss you pls don't ever stop loving me pls. .
